title: Obama Addresses Troops In Afghanistan On Eve Of Memorial Day
teaser: President Obama made a surprise visit Sunday to Bagram Airfield in Afghanistan. The president addressed troops, thanking them for their service on the eve of Memorial Day. White House correspondent Scott Horsley is traveling with the president and joins NPR's Arun Rath.
contentencoded: Copyright 2014 NPR. To see more, visit http://www.npr.org/.
